emuInput.TitMainTitle: Doris Griffin holding her newborn twins Doris and Delores, with her other children: John, Mary, Evelyn, Sharon, and Robert Griffin, in their multi-family home on Western Avenue, Northside
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 2, 1957, pg. 2, reads: "Where Will They Go? - Where will large families like those of Mrs. Doris Griffin, who now lives with her six children, above, including new-born twins, in one of the two double houses for large families on Western Ave. be re-located? The have received an eviction notice. She lives with her sister, Mrs. Blanche Scott, who has two children, who 'fronted' for her sister when hard-to-get place for large families was rented. Left to right: Mrs. Griffin, the twins, Doris and Delores, John, Mary, Evelyn, Sharon and Robert. - Harris Photo."
